alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Camden County through 1000 PM EDT... At 854 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodbine, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Woodbine, Kings Bay Base, Harrietts Bluff, Dover Bluff and Colesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
